title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: David Braun We have on the line David Braun who is at this moment up in the Capital offices in Albany awaiting... <!--more--> to testify on behalf of opposition to hydrofracking in New York state.
David is helping to coordinate anti-fracking efforts with our rally at Governor Andrew Cuomoâ€™s Manhattan office this coming Saturday at Noon.
He is the co-founder and president of United for Action, a nonprofit public policy organization dedicated to stopping hydraulic fracturing of gas wells in the Mid Atlantic states and nationally.
He is also the campaign director for the Academy Award nominated documentary Gasland.
